name: Q-and-A
body:
### Welcome to GIS4DEV
This is a page devoted to using Open Source software to address issues related to environmental sustainability and the development of human well-being in developing countries.
It is envisioned as a platform for GIS students to share a growing body of knowledge of technical issues and fixes using QGIS, SpatiaLite, and SAGA.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
